cast.name: 雷切尔·布兰卡德 Rachel Blanchard
梅勒妮·帕帕拉 Melanie Papalia
阿莉娅·奥伯里恩 Aliyah O'Brien

writer.name: 约翰·H·理查森 John H. Richardson

trans_title: 情牵你我她 第五季
introduction: What begins as an meijubar.net impulsive "date" between suburban husband Jack and neophyte escort Izzy, spins into a whirlwind three-way sexual affair including Jack's wife Emma, who has been keeping secrets of her own. Over a span of just 10 days, their "arrangement" breaks free of its financial bonds to become something else entirely: A real romance, with real stakes, involving three real people, confronting viewers with the compelling question: What if your best, truest, happiest life looked nothing like you thought it would? Would you be brave enough to live it?
chinese_title: 情牵你我她 第五季
